title: List of tallest buildings in Los Angeles
summary: The tallest building in Los Angeles, California, is the Wilshire Grand Center, which is 1,100 feet (335.3Â m) tall and became the tallest building in 2017. It is also the tallest building in the state, the tallest building west of the Mississippi River, and the 15th-tallest building in the United States. Seven of the ten tallest buildings in California are located in Los Angeles.[1]
